room_title: Escape room "Metro Mayhem" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
room_address: 14015 E Independence Blvd Indian Trail, NC 28079
room_description: Metro City has a supervillain problem, and his name is Doctor Devastation. The agents of the Good Guys Organization snagged him for jaywalking but you will only have one hour until his lawyer bails him out. Your challenge is to search his office overlooking the city and discover the details of his evil genius plan. Can you uncover his plans? Save the city? Make it out alive?
